text:
[Verse]
Rain drops fall down
City painted grey
Umbrellas all around
People start to sway

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the street
Feet begin to dance
Feel the rhythm beat
Taking every chance

[Chorus]
Rainy day parade
Joy we can't evade
Dancing in the storm
Hearts feeling so warm

[Verse 3]
Wet shoes splashing
Laughter in the air
Magic in the rain
People everywhere

[Bridge]
Thunder in the sky
Lightning lights the crowd
No need to ask why
We shout it out loud

[Chorus]
Rainy day parade
Joy we can't evade
Dancing in the storm
Hearts feeling so warm
title: Rainy Day Parade
